tobacco.description: Allowances and declarations of excisable tobacco goods

alcohol.description: Allowances and declarations of excisable alcohol goods

other.description: Allowances and declarations of non-excisable goods

request.description: A goods claimed against an allowance

commoditycode.description: The 8 character Combined Nomenclature (CN) commodity code of the goods

commoditycodequalifier.description: Certain UK excise duties apply to different commodities which have the same commodity code, e.g.: handrolling vs. other types of loose tobacco, or cigars vs. cigarillos

volume.description: The volume of the commodity, in litres, if the goods is measured by volume (e.g. alchoholic beverages)

quantity.description: The number of commodity items, if the goods is measured by number (e.g. cigarettes)

weight.description: The weight of the commodity, in grammes, if the goods is measured by weight

value.description: The amount of money paid to purchase the commodity in it's country of origin

valuecurrency.description: The currency code for the commodity value

origin.description: The country code of the origin of the commodity

rrp.description: Recommended retail price of the goods, per cigarette (commodity code must be 24022000)

abv.description: A.B.V measure of the commodity, if it is an alcoholic beverage, as a decimal

savingagainstallowance.description: Amount of duty saved by allocating this goods to the allowance

claimagainstallowance.description: Amount of this goods to claim against the allowance

convertedrequest.description: A request with an optional currency conversion

currencyconversion.description: A curency conversion that has been applied to a request

basecurrency.description: The currency code of the currency to convert from

targetcurrency.description: The currency code of the currency to convert to

rate.description: The conversion rate between the two currencies

value.description: The amount of money in the base currency

convertedvalue.description: The conversion result: - the amount of money in the target currency

declaration.description: A goods request that is deemed to be subject to duties

excise.description: the excise duty elements of the calculation

total.description: the total amount of excise duty charged for the request

elements.description: the exise duties charged against this request

import.description: the import duty elements of the calculation

total.description: the total amount of import duty charged for the request

elements.description: the import duties charged against this request

vat.description: the VAT elements of the calculation

total.description: the total amount of VAT charged for the request

elements.description: the VAT charged against this request

total.description: the total amount of duty payable against this request

aggregate.description: The 'aggregate' duty payable against this request (non-excise items only)

total.description: The total of the 'aggregate' duty to be charged against this item

elements.description: the VAT charged against this request

dutyitem.description: a duty to be charged against an item

taxtype.description: The type of tax to apply

rate.description: the rate associated with the tax that has been applied

value.description: The calculated amount of the tax to be applied to the item

totals.description: The total value duties to be applied to the received requests

customsvalue.description: Total value of the declared goods items

allduties.description: The total value of all duties charged against the goods item

aggregatedduties.description: the 'aggregated' rate of duty that would be charged against the goods
